title: Radio City Music Hall: Carpet Design: Still Life with Violins and Wine Glasses
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream illustration board, lined
description: Pattern in dark brown, terra cotta, and blues, dark and light, of violins and wine glasses placed in diagonal rows, so that two violins (their necks facing away from each other) interchange with a row of alternating violins and wineglasses.
name: Drawing
